      • validateDigest

        public static boolean validateDigest(java.io.InputStream inputStream,
                                     java.lang.String expectedDigest)
        Validate the digest against the given data
        Parameters:
        inputStream - the inputStream
        expectedDigest - the expected digest of the data
        Returns:
        true if digest validation passes, otherwise an DigestDoesNotMatchException
        See Also:
